p: The three-dimensional structures of 54 FDA approved antiviral drugs ( De Clercq and Li, 2016) ( Table 1 ) and the control inhibitors-SSYA 10-001, SSYA 10-002, Myricetin, Scutellarein and Sinefungin were downloaded from Pubchem database ( Kim et al., 2016) in SDF format. The drugs lacking the 3D structure were converted into the 3D structure using OpenBabel version 2.4.1 ( O'Boyle et al., 2011) and optimized using MMFF94 force field ( Halgren, 1996).
